programme.title: Finding Father Christmas
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Christmas for Miranda is a painful reminder of the family she never had.

programme.title: Christmas with Tucker
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Thirteen-year-old George struggles to deal with the death of his father.

programme.title: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: Hallmark Hall of Fame. A high-powered Los Angeles lawyer returns to his deceased father's home.

programme.title: Christmas Festival of Ice
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Emma sets out to save her town's beloved ice sculpture contest.

programme.title: Christmas at the Palace
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Figure skater Katie brings the royal family together with her Christmas joy.

programme.title: Christmas Homecoming
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. A military widow and an Army Captain team up to save the town's military museum.

programme.title: Entertaining Christmas
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Small town Vermont gets a surprise visit from the Queen of Crafts.

programme.title: A Gingerbread Romance
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. An architect teams up with local baker to build a life-size gingerbread house.

programme.title: One Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Hallmark Hall of Fame. A divorced mom wants her two kids' first Christmas without dad to be perfect.

programme.title: Every Christmas Has A Story
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. A TV personality is invited to the Most Christmas-y town in the US.

programme.title: A Dog Named Christmas
programme.desc: Hallmark Hall of Fame. A young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog.

programme.title: Christmas with Tucker
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Thirteen-year-old George struggles to deal with the death of his father.

programme.title: Return to Christmas Creek
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Amelia returns to Christmas Creek to rediscover family at Christmas.

programme.title: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: Hallmark Hall of Fame. A high-powered Los Angeles lawyer returns to his deceased father's home.

programme.title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane
programme.desc: Long-forgotten child star Baby Jane Hudson neglects her wheelchair-bound sister Blanche's needs, while selfishly spending her money on an alarming amount of liquor.

programme.title: When She Was Bad
programme.desc: Stressed by a recent move and being a stay-at-home mom, Teeny takes her bottled-up rage out on her daughter Robbie. Only the help of her friends, family, and counselors can stop her.

programme.title: Target
programme.desc: Army sniper Charlie Snow finds himself on the other end of the crosshairs when the brother of arms dealer whom he killed comes for revenge. Charlie must use the skills that made him stop him.

programme.title: Skinheads
programme.desc: A group of students are harassed by a gang of skinheads in the Colorado mountains. When they're subjected to the neo-Nazis' violent racism, one must flee in order to avoid being silenced.

programme.title: Then There Were Giants
programme.desc: Explore the relationship between the strongest trio in history: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Winston Churchill, and Joseph Stalin. As these men led the world through war, they formed an unlikely union.

programme.title: Then There Were Giants
programme.desc: The Big Three strategize, considering how to move forward and best shape the postwar world. They meet in Tehran, Iran and commit to opening a Western Front against Nazi Germany.

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead
programme.desc: In 1944, a patrol of American soldiers--after being driven off of their observation post by German troops--tries to make it back through enemy territory to safety, with the Germans in hot pursuit.

programme.title: Bomb at Ten: Ten
programme.desc: An American pilot escapes from an German POW camp and joins forces with the Balkan Underground. Together, they plot to assassinate the camp's commandant while pursued by the SS.

programme.title: Where the Red Fern Grows: Part Two
programme.desc: An embittered World War II veteran returns to his grandfather's home in the Louisiana woods. The old man helps his grandson readjust by giving him two hound dog puppies to care for.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: Saving Lincoln tells the true story of President Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War-era photographs.

programme.title: Fallen Not Forgotten
programme.desc: Sgt. Smith struggles to find hope amidst the overwhelming odds of the Battle of the Bulge. Igniting his will to survive is the woman he left behind waiting resolutely for his return.

programme.title: Hiroshima: Out of the Ashes
programme.desc: On August 6, 1945, the first atomic bomb exploded over Hiroshima. This is the true story of a few Americans, Europeans, and Japanese who struggled to survive the most devastating attack in history.

programme.title: In Love and War
programme.desc: James Woods stars in this biographical portrait of war hero and future Ross Perot running mate, James Stockdale--a naval pilot held as a POW by the Vietnamese for over eight years.

programme.title: Mad Dog Morgan
programme.desc: The true story of Irish outlaw Daniel Morgan, who is wanted, dead or alive, in Australia during the 1850s.

programme.title: The Man Called Noon
programme.desc: Rubal Noon blazes a trail of vengeance across the West after his family is massacred. No one is safe from his blood lusting fury. Suddenly, Noon is Ambushed and falls victim to loss of memory. A mysterious desperado comes to his aid for unknown reasons. Noon holds the secret to a fortune in gold. The desperado along with many others impatiently wait for Rubal Noon’s Memory to return. And when he does remember -- all hell breaks lose!

programme.title: Sonny Boy
programme.desc: A small-town crime boss accepts delivery of a stolen car, only to find there's a baby in the back-seat. He and his transgender wife cut out the boy's tongue and raise him as a mute accomplice in their crimes. When the grown "Sonny Boy" escapes and tries to make contact with the outside world, the attention he draws to his warped family results in darkly-humored mayhem.

programme.title: Mad Dog Morgan
programme.desc: The true story of Irish outlaw Daniel Morgan, who is wanted, dead or alive, in Australia during the 1850s.

programme.title: The Man Called Noon
programme.desc: Rubal Noon blazes a trail of vengeance across the West after his family is massacred. No one is safe from his blood lusting fury. Suddenly, Noon is Ambushed and falls victim to loss of memory. A mysterious desperado comes to his aid for unknown reasons. Noon holds the secret to a fortune in gold. The desperado along with many others impatiently wait for Rubal Noon’s Memory to return. And when he does remember -- all hell breaks lose!

programme.title: Rogue Male
programme.desc: TV movie finds ‘30s British aristocrat O’Toole plotting to assassinate Hitler. When his plan fails, he’s on the run from both the Gestapo and the British police.

programme.title: They Call Me Trinity
programme.desc: A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.

programme.title: Days Of Wrath
programme.desc: A hard, cold, ruthless killer teaches a young man the rules of a life dedicated to violence and based on the speed of a gun. The young man later denies that lifestyle and the two stalk each other throughout the town in a climactic duel to the death.
